name: Attack of the Shapes (diegodem)
description:
This game has been made for the GeoJam 2021.

"Shapes are attacking from The Other Side. The more sides a shape has, the more energy. If you collide with a shape with less energy than you, you will steal energy from it. But if you collide with a shape with more energy than you, it will steal energy from you."

Controls:

Move shape with UP/DOWN arrow key

Attributions:

Music: Ship (Spacejacked OST) by sawsquarenoise (http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com/)

Jam notes:

All the assets, design and code were done by me within the timespan of the Game Jam, exceptuating the music.
